name: 'voider
description:
'voider is a small prototype made for the Phillip's Birthday Game Jam. The game is about avoiding always spawning obstacles and getting the highest score possible. The game was made using only 5 materials,  primitive objects (in this case only cubes), made using the Unity version 2020.3.24f1 LTS and contains only 1 scene. It uses the new input system, so it should work fine on both AZERTY and QWERTY keyboard layouts. It was made in 2 days in total as I found out about this jam a tiny bit too late. It unfortunately has no sound as I was too busy with school during the time and participating in Nokia 3310 Jam 4 too.

Oh yeah, if you're Phillip, Happy Birthday!
